content: In the first quarter, revenue grew by 4% to $6.8 million and gross profit was $4.5 million, which produced a gross margin of 65.8%. The geography breakdown as a percentage of revenues for the first quarter of 2022 compared to the year ago quarter is as follows: North America 41% versus 50%, EMEA 38% versus 35%, APAC 16% versus 13%, Latin America 4% versus 2%, and others 1% versus 0%. Our reported operating expenses were $5.1 million, an increase of 8.3% from the prior year’s first quarter operating expenses of $4.7 million. Our reported operating loss for the first quarter was $0.7 million, relatively unchanged compared to the year ago period. Our reported loss from continuing operation was $1.1 million in the first quarter of 2022, compared to a loss from continuing operation of $0.7 million in the year ago quarter.
